attributes.action: Assure that the celebrity repeat-offender Pete Docherty should serve the full 14-week sentence handed down to him this week, thereby preventing him from appearing at the Glastonbury festival and profiting from the event.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The sentence handed down to Pete Docherty covers a term of 14 weeks imprisonment. Under the early release system our legal system provides, Pete Docherty could be back on the streets as soon as one month from now.

This would allow Docherty to appear at Glastonbury Festival and profit from his reputation as a drug abuser during the period he should be in prison for his crimes.
